page.title: 10Laverstock Secondary School.
page.content: Highbury Boys Secondary Modern School is on the same campus site as the other schools. Originally this school was in Highbury Avenue, in west Salisbury. The boys moved here in 1962 while its original building was adapted as a Middle School. The school has some 700 pupils who come from the wide catchment area of East Salisbury and Downton.{The school specialises in {providing a sound broad based {practical education for its pupils, and has many excellent facilities for science, engineering and art/craft courses. The large playing field and sports hall are useful features essential for providing opportunities for the P.E. and Games.
